name: The Sapper
description: A classic puzzle game in a completely new form! You have to demine the fields and carefully analize the situation you are in.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
